sentences.en: ...farming without any purchased chemical, fertilizer or pesticide.
sentences.cn: …不使用任何购买的化学品、肥料或杀虫剂的耕作。

sentences.en: farming without any purchased chemical, fertilizer or pesticide
sentences.cn: 不使用任何购买的化学品、肥料或杀虫剂的耕作

sentences.en: Fertilizer will accelerate the growth of these tomato plants.
sentences.cn: 肥料将促进这些西红柿秧生长.

sentences.en: Freshly dead poultry can be rendered into fertilizer or other products.
sentences.cn: 新死的家畜可以炼制成肥料或其它产品.

sentences.en: Get some more fertilizer for the garden.
He was not only a distinguished writer but a fertilizer of other talents.
sentences.cn: 他不仅是个杰出的作家,而且还有使人获益的其它才干.

sentences.en: How much fertilizer should be applied on one mu of land?
The chemical fertilizer quality that this factory is produced is good.
sentences.cn: 这个工厂生产的化肥质量好.

sentences.en: The chemical fertilizer should be well dug in.
sentences.cn: 化学肥料应该均匀地混入土壤中.

sentences.en: The company said it will stop producing fertilizer in 1990 because of continued losses.
sentences.cn: 由于持续亏损，该公司说它将在1990年停止生产化肥。

sentences.en: The organic fertilizer shall keep the soil in good heart.
sentences.cn: 这有机肥一定会使土壤保持肥沃.

sentences.en: The peasant bought a bag of chemical fertilizer in the market place.
sentences.cn: 这位农民在集市上买了一袋化肥。

sentences.en: The tractor hauled the fertilizer away.
There is a calculatedly abundant use of fertilizer and irrigation.
sentences.cn: 在经过周密计算之后充分使用肥料和灌溉.

sentences.en: Work in a balanced fertilizer before planting.
sentences.cn: 种植前加入养分均衡的肥料。

words.tran_cn: 富饶的，肥沃的；能生育的

phrases.tran_cn: 有机肥；有机肥料；有机质

trans.tran_en: a substance that is put on the soil to make plants grow
